title: kernel driver
extract: The kernel is the central module of an operating system (OS). ... The the kernel code is usually loaded into a protected area of memory to prevent it from being overwritten by programs or other parts of the operating system.
extract_html: The kernel is the central module of an operating system (OS). ... The the kernel code is usually loaded into a protected area of memory to prevent it from being overwritten by programs or other parts of the operating system.
